description:
Update test expectations for some layout tests for <video> and <audio>
Some tests appear to be flaky in build bot, adjust their expectations.

TBR=scherkus


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=18431

messages.text:
LGTM -- one question though

http://codereview.chromium.org/126142/diff/1/2
File webkit/tools/layout_tests/test_expectations.txt (left):

http://codereview.chromium.org/126142/diff/1/2#oldcode608
Line 608: BUG4363 : LayoutTests/http/tests/security/local-video-poster-from-remote.html = FAIL TIMEOUT
what happened to this layout test?
It passes consistently on the build bot, so remove it from failure.

subject: Update test expectations for some layout tests for <video> and <audio>...
